name: Operation Tormentor
description:
Game for the Weekly Game Jam #150

Take control of the ultimate airship and get rid of those who stand in your way.
Be careful though, for your vehicle may just tear apart !

Disclaimer: First Game Jam, final form not implemented

Tools: Unity, Gimp, assets & cringy sound effects from scratch 

[W/S] to move the spaceship up and down
[A/D] to rotate machine gun
[Z] to shoot from machine gun
[Mouse Left-click] on airplanes to launch a missile towards them
